transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Haan sir.
Customer: Ji bataiye. Sir, sir good evening Praveen bol raha hun Abdullah sir bole hain aapse hi baat karne ko.
Executive: Kya hua kya hai?
Customer: Hain?
Executive: Kya hua hai?
Customer: Sir hua ye tha na matlab ek ticket aayi thi isme ye tha ki usme ye tha ki jo leads aayi wo thoda fake aa rahi hai.
Executive: Hmm hmm. Haan. Mera number se kya aayega Abdullah bhai se sambandhit hai?
Customer: Sir ye aap hi ke number se hai 298 se hui hai. Primary jo aapka hai na 70298. To thoda sa bata dijiye sir ji main thoda usko lead ka jo quality hai main ek bar theek karwa deta hun backend team se check karwa ke.
Executive: Haan Abdullah bhai ne complaint karwaya hoga. Theek hai Abdullah bhai paas mein hi the abhi shayad wo nahi kahin nikle hain.
Customer: Haan haan.
Executive: Abdullah baat hua Abdullah bhai se?
Customer: Abdullah sir se meri baat hui to wo kahin busy the to wo kah rahe hain ki Praveen bhai aap ek bar sir se baat kar lo Kumar sir se.
Executive: Haan. Theek hai to maine unko bola ki sir bataiye kya issue aa raha hai. To bole ki bhai thoda leads wagera proper nahi aa rahi hai ek bar aap Kumar sir se baat kar lo aur maine kaha sir dekho lead ka jo sir bhi jante hain wo bhi IndiaMARTs kam kar chuke hain proper tarike se. Thoda sa ye hai ki ab conversion nahi aa raha hai. Main issue ye hai ki sir potential buyer connect nahi ho pate hain. Fir unhone bole fir hamare area se to maine kaha sir aapke area se Jai Balaji Timber one hai. Wo TrustSeal use karte hain aur website bhi use karte hain unko achcha conversion nikal raha hai sir. To ek bar TrustSeal ka ek bar dekh lijiye sir agar do saal mein teen saal mein nahi plan kar pa rahe ho aap log to one year mein kijiye. Agar main aapko teen se char mahine mein karwa ke achcha business dunga sir to aap deen ko do saal ya teen saal mein convert kara lijiyega sir. To wo bole ek bar sir se baat kar lo aap aap se isliye maine fir aapko bola. 
Executive: Dekhiye abhi abhi jo mamla jo bhi hai aap wahi samajh sakte hain kyunki hum abhi baat to unse ek bar baat kar lete hain fir aapse main baat karta hun.
Customer: Achcha.
Executive: Abhi main bulata hun unko. Hmm hmm. Abhi main kahin pehle hua. Haan sir ek cheez bolna chahunga ek bar aap baat kar lijiye aur baat karne ke baad na dekho abhi to matlab hum log ka chutti bhi ho rahi hai kal ek bar na thoda sa mujhe bataiyega aur ye Jai Balaji Timber ko to aap jante ho na sir isse?
Customer: Nahi wo jante hain na ab wo sab mera to ab unse baat chit soch na matlab kam to wahi dekh rahe hain humne unko bol diya handover aap hi ko wo complaint shayad mere number se kiye honge wo soch rahe honge mere number se complaint karna seekh rahega.
Customer: Achcha.
Executive: To abhi sir ek bar baat unse hua hai to bole lead ka issue aa raha hai.
Customer: Lead ka proper nahi bataya maine direct unhone yahi bola aapka recording hota hai na?
Executive: Hota hai.
Customer: Unhone dekho maine call kiya hai na sir to maine kaha sir aapke number se ek wo aaya kya bolte hain ki ek concern aaya hai to kah rahe hain bataiye maine kaha to unhone bola ki main busy hun aap ek bar Kumar sir se baat kar lo wahi dekh rahe hain account. To maine kaha theek hai sir.
Executive: Maine nahi maine bola problem kya aa raha hai problem kya aa raha hai unse ek bar main baat kar leta hun. Point ye hai ki leads ka concern sach mein agar nahi ho raha hoga to ab isme upgrade package mein aap bol rahe hain wo unka man hi nahi hoga kyunki jab inki package mein do bar 33000 40 33000 40 kar diye mera unka koi abhi gap ka baat to hua nahi ki package upgrade ka call aaya wo unse baat puchna padega ki upgrade karana hai kya karana hai wo jante hain.
Customer: Sir ek bar dekhiye aap unse baat kar lijiyega main force nahi kar raha hun ki aap upgrade kijiye kijiye. Theek hai main just aapko ye sir suggest kar raha hun ki dekho aapke area se ye kam kar rahe hain kyunki TrustSeal mein business utha rahe hain sir. Main aapko nahi kah raha hun sir nahi aap karo Balaji dekhiye Balaji hain kis location mein hain kya hain wo thoda sa aap dekh lo. Balaji ye jo hain yahan pe kis location mein hain aur Kolkata lead nahi aa raha hai na. Inko leads nahi aa raha hai. Baat bhi kar rahe hain bol rahe the abhi aapke according man ke chaliye to bol rahe the yahan hum abhi matlab is plan ko last time hum log se jo meeting hua tha theek hai ek bar IndiaMART ko leke ki ab ground pe kam nahi ho pa raha hai. Pichle saat mahine hum log yaad hai last week mein hum logo ka meeting hua tha to Vishwajeet ji bhi the wo bhi the Abdullah bhai bhi the hum bhi the. To humne bola tha ki sir dekho agar business nahi mil raha hai to band kar do. Mil raha hai to continue karo. Main yahi na bol sakta hun aap apna business karoge. Haan bilkul. To point yahi rakhoge na ki bhai mil raha hai agar kisi platform mein paisa laga rahe ho mil raha hai to theek hai nahi mil raha hai to band kar do. Jahan tak baat hai tumhare paise ke bhai wo refund hoga ki nahi hoga wo chhod do upar wale ke hath mein chhod do apne hi baki ke cheeze agar aapko lag raha hai business nikal raha hai. Competitor ke hisab se policy ko samajh ke upgrade karna hai to upgrade karo. Unka kahana yahi tha last Vishwajeet ji main jo baat bole the ki dekho saat mahine package liye kitna mahina hua? Ho gaya sir June mein liye the shayad. July August September October November November se yani paanch mahine ho gaye na. Hmm. Paanch mahine ke beech mein ek bhi deal nahi hua hai. Consume proper hua hai. Proper hua hai. aapko to sab kuch pata hai sir aapko batane ki kya jarurat hai aap everything jante ho lekin sir main kam nahi kar raha hun abhi abhi main kam unhi ko training de diya hun wahi sab dekh rahe hain mere ko sirf bas unka kam jo tha proper dikhana hum apna kam start kar liye hain hamara kam start apna hua hua hai kariban apna mere company already aapke IndiaMART mein hai lekin aisa kuch hua nahi hai abhi. Achcha GST aa raha hai main us pe apna focus us pe kar raha hun ye sara kam ab yahi kar rahe hain yahi dono kar rahe hain log Vishwajeet ji aur Abdullah ji. Sir thoda sa ek bar convince kijiyega sir. se start ki thi jab inhone TrustSeal kiya to inka business achcha conversion aaya sir ye company website mein aa gayi agar inko sir sochiye sir agar TrustSeal mein business nahi aata kya ye ye company hume kya paisa deti bilkul nahi deti tabhi to baat aap kar wahi to baat hai na wahi to baat hai na product line mein hai sir same product line mein. Main samajh raha hun aap inka na main ratio dikha dunga sir aap ek bar dekhoge to kahoge haan waaki mein customer kiya hai tabhi to inko business aa raha hai. Main kahan bol raha hun.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer reports fake leads.

- No business in the last five months.



Resolution:

- Executive will check with backend team.

- Executive will talk to Kumar about the issue.

- Executive suggested TrustSeal for better conversion.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call the customer back.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, trustseal, refund, conversion
